text: Yaqeenan kufr kiya un logon ne jinhon ne kaha Maseeh ibn Mariyam khuda hai. (Aey Muhammad)! Inse kaho ke agar khuda Maseeh Ibn Mariyam ko aur uski Maa aur tamaam zameen walon ko halaak kardena chahe to kiski majaal hai ke usko is irade se baaz rakh sakey? Allah to zameen aur aasmano ka aur un sab cheezon ka malik hai jo zameen aur aasmano ke darmiyan payi jati hain, jo kuch chahta hai paida karta hai aur uski qudrat har cheez par haawi hai
